Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/53rd Place
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Garfield, Union, 51st & Halsted Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/53rd Place.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Garfield, Union, 51st, then resume their normal route on Halsted due to police activity near Halsted/53rd Place.

Allow extra travel time.
